inputs.selection_motivation: Australia’s productivity growth directly enhances the competitiveness and output of its rare‑earths sector, a major export industry; linking the two clarifies how macro drivers translate into sectoral performance.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are the most plausible direct or close-in influences to Australia Productivity Growth, reflecting domestic macro conditions and structural factors. They also include infrastructure and resource-sector dynamics that commonly affect productivity.

proposed_link.motivation: Australia’s productivity growth directly enhances the competitiveness and output of its rare‑earths sector, a major export industry; linking the two clarifies how macro drivers translate into sectoral performance.
